Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~sahilgoel - When you initially create a channel, you can only add organizations which are part of the consortium. In order to add an organization which is not in the consortium, you will need to perform a channel update transaction to add the external organization (you also need to include all of the MSP information for the org in the config update - you can't just reference it by org/mspid)
